Articles.Content: Heya all, I was thinking wouldn't it be swell if Kerbals could pick up objects, say, those that were small and light (as gravity dictates) enough to wield, perhaps after the addition of a special Kerb-o-handle part? I long to pull my AlSEP package into place, or brandish some other bleepy-bloop science machine across the Mun. Just throwing ideas out there!
It's in the works. Some time ago devs shown animations for kerbals picking rocks from the ground, examining them etc. So, one day...

It's in the works. Some time ago devs shown animations for kerbals picking rocks from the ground, examining them etc. So, one day...

then we just need a weather system and we can have all out kerbal snowball fights woo
